Today in Moray, Spey Bay and Lossiemouth are offering small but clean surf at 1 ft @10s NNE with fresh 15 mph WSW winds. Best times are during the mid-tide push from 08:47 to 15:25. Tomorrow, conditions drop slightly to 2 ft @5s WSW with moderate 11 mph SSW winds, making it less favorable. The day after, expect similar poor conditions with 1 ft @4s W on light 8 mph S winds. Best: today.
